michael john gordon is an australian composer record producer musician and sound designer composing music primarily for video games  gordon has composed for several firstperson shooters including atomic heart lawbreakers wolfenstein the new order wolfenstein the old blood prey the soft reboot of doom and its sequel doom eternal wolfenstein ii the new colossus and the first two seasons of the 2013 fighting game killer instinct
